short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide annoying Google AI Overviews with on/off toggle.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Overview Blocker: Streamline Your Google Search Experience

Tired of AI-generated overviews cluttering your Google search results? AI Overview Blocker is here to help! This lightweight, user-friendly Chrome extension allows you to hide those sometimes distracting AI overviews with just a single click.
Key Features:

Instantly hide AI-generated overviews on Google search pages
Easy on/off toggle for quick customization of your search experience
Works across multiple Google domains for international users
Sleek, modern interface that's simple to use
Minimal performance impact on your browsing

How It Works:

Once installed, AI Overview Blocker runs silently in the background, ready to enhance your Google search experience. Click the extension icon to open a small popup where you can toggle the blocking on or off with a simple switch. Your preference is remembered across browsing sessions, so you only need to set it once.
Whether you're a student, professional, or casual web surfer, AI Overview Blocker helps you focus on the search results that matter most to you. Say goodbye to information overload and hello to a cleaner, more personalized Google search experience!

Get AI Overview Blocker today and take control of your search results!
